name: O.R.B.S.
description:
Space, it's big and humanity is across the stars! Which means we need to move goods from one part of space to another! Which means Freight, and that means pirates and various space objects that are in the way.

Because of the cost of space travel, contractors are hired to defend freighters as they travel through the purple-blue, and that's you! Welcome to the future.

Pilot your space defense vehicle and stop any ne'er-do-wells from damaging the precious cargo.

Controls

ControlActionMovementAiming and movement
PrimaryFire railgun, thrusters
SecondaryLoad round
Change State
Switch from state to state
EjectQuit game

Credits

Made for the GitHub GameOff 2018, the theme being HYBRID.

This repo can be found here: https://github.com/BigHandInSky/orbs

And in the same spirit I've made my planning notion page public as well

Music by hankworx: https://hankworx.itch.io/

Assets used:

  • SInput which is unbelievably good
  • ATM asset & textures by Yemelyan K.
  • Free Shipping Containers by Calvin Weibel
  • spacescape by 'petrocket' for the skybox
  • Textures from NASA for planets
  • A few textures from various packs on OpenGameArt.org:
    • 50 free textures 5 by rubberduck
    • seamless industrial textures by rubberduck

And various sound packs from the unity asset store:

  • Universal Sound FX (best asset you can buy guaranteed)
  • A couple bits from this pack by Eric Berzins
  • And some from this one by Marcin Klosowski
